entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
